# usa-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                    | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `external` | `external` | Whether internal or external link.                                                                                                                             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href`     | `href`     | The link href.                                                                                                                                                 | `string`  | `'#'`       |
| `inverse`  | `inverse`  | Inverse link for dark backgrounds. Previously alt, but changed to avoid confusion with existing HTML alt attribute. ? This would be a considered a new "mode." | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `text`     | `text`     | The link label.                                                                                                                                                | `string`  | `undefined` |
